mdRecord.dcterms:title: Beckner Cemetery #2, (aka Howery) Little River Dist.
mdRecord.dcterms:description:
Across from 4054 Franklin Pike. The property belongs to 4149 Franklin Pike Dairy Trucking business. Access: go thru gate, thru pasture, thru 2nd gate, across culvert, uphill. Beware of friendly cows looking for food from humans.
N 36 57.105' W 80.11.140'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
